EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Rocky Hill Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Big Data Roadshow - Rocky Hill - Cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
The Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Rocky Hill that was scheduled on Tuesday, June 16 has been cancelled.
We would like to extend the opportunity for you to join us at the Big Data Roadshow Burlington, MA <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/boston> on Thursday, June 18. Tim Zue, SVP of Business Development, Boston Red Sox will be delivering,“The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise”.
There are a few spots left so please visit the event page for registration details: Big Data Roadshow Boston <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/boston>.
For upcoming events visit us at Pivotal.io <http://pivotal.io/news-events> and select the events tab. We look forward to seeing you soon!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
